item.description:
Ever had to sit through an hours long flight? On this day in history, the first flight of a Boeing 727 jet took place in 1963. Wanna bet that also the first passenger to knit on a 727 was also there?

***Update***

Since the weather has been odd for the past couple of weeks and some people have not been able to make it, we are rescheduling the Stranded Knitting technique workshop for this meeting. For those who want to participate in the workshop, please bring a pattern and several balls of single colour yarn to get started!
item.name: "Knitting, on a jet plane" Knit Night
